Functions
isSerialNonEmpty

Returns a boolean that says whether the serial buffer is empty or not

Returns

Returns a boolean that says whether the serial buffer is empty or not

Get size of the buffer

Returns

Returns a an int that represents the size of the buffer

Parameters

readCharFromWaitingSerial

Returns
